author: NihilistHUGZ
body: Do any of you know Wyckoff Theory or Fibonacci Retracements...?  Smart Money whales have SHIB as a part of their managed portfolio and the reason that we see such stability is because serious analysts and skilled traders hold more SHIB than easily spooked looking for fast money retail investors.  Thats why as the price appreciation moves through the sell wall retail investors jump because they have been scared waiting to get out and break even.  Smart Money has nearly shaken out all the weak longs from small holders by letting their DCAs act as exit liquidity.  Algorithms from managed portfolios provide volatility and liquidity and what is happening right now??
